casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jacob Mark SPIVEY. No. 143PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 21, 2015. W. Michael Spivey, Rocky Mount, for Spivey, Jacob Mark. Brent Kiziah, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of July 2015 by Defendant's attorney to Withdraw:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of August 2015."
